text: Cells. Vero E6 cells and BHK cells were kindly provided by E. Snijder (University of Leiden, the Netherlands) and H. Laude (Unit√© de Virologie et Immunologie Molecularies, INRA, France), respectively. In all cases, cells were grown in Dulbecco's modified Eagle's medium (DMEM; Gibco) supplemented with 25 mM HEPES, 2 mM L-glutamine (Sigma), 1% nonessential amino acids (Sigma), and 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS; BioWhittaker, Inc.). Virus titrations were performed in Vero E6 cells as previously described (61) .
